services.subtitle: Treatments
services.title: Our Treatments
services.description: We offer modern solutions to safely and naturally enhance your beauty.

descriptions.botulinica: Botulinum toxin is a powerful ally in reducing wrinkles and expression lines, giving your face a more relaxed, refreshed, and natural look. We use Dysport®, a globally recognized brand known for its high effectiveness, quick onset, and long-lasting results. In addition to facial rejuvenation, botulinum toxin is also used to treat bruxism, tension headaches, and hyperhidrosis (excessive sweating), improving comfort and quality of life.
descriptions.colageno: As we age, collagen production decreases, leading to sagging and loss of firmness. Collagen biostimulators are injected to naturally stimulate collagen production, enhancing skin texture, firmness, and facial and body contours. It’s a progressive and safe treatment with long-lasting, natural results—ideal for those who want to improve sagging without using volumizing fillers.
descriptions.hialuronico: Hyaluronic acid fillers are a safe and effective way to restore lost volume, smooth lines, and highlight natural facial features. Common areas include the lips, under-eyes, jawline, chin, and nasolabial folds. The treatment offers facial harmonization while respecting the individual characteristics of each patient.
descriptions.skinbooster: Skinbooster is a deep hydration treatment where a specific hyaluronic acid is injected into the inner layers of the skin without adding volume. The result is firmer, more radiant skin with smoother texture. Ideal for areas like the face, neck, chest, and hands—especially for dehydrated, tired-looking skin in need of revitalization.
descriptions.blefaroplastia: Non-surgical blepharoplasty is a modern and effective way to rejuvenate the eye area without incisions. Using advanced technologies such as CO₂ hybrid laser and plasma jet, this procedure tightens the eyelid skin, stimulates collagen, and enhances firmness, revealing a more youthful, open, and refreshed appearance.
descriptions.plasma: For milder cases or patients with more sensitive skin, plasma jet treatment may be recommended. It creates tiny retraction points on the skin’s surface, improving sagging through controlled healing. This is a great option for those seeking a less invasive procedure with quicker recovery.
descriptions.melasma: Melasma is a chronic condition characterized by brownish patches on the skin, primarily the face. It commonly affects women aged 20–50 and can be triggered or worsened by sun exposure, hormonal changes, genetics, and even stress.
descriptions.tricologia: Androgenetic alopecia (baldness) is a progressive condition that affects millions of men and women, often beginning at a young age. Beyond its aesthetic impact, it significantly affects self-esteem, social interactions, and emotional well-being.
descriptions.gordura: Localized fat is one of the most common body concerns, even among those with a healthy weight and lifestyle. Persistent fat can accumulate in areas like the abdomen, flanks, back, arms, and under the chin.

item1.q: Does non-surgical blepharoplasty replace traditional surgery?
item1.a: In many cases, yes. For patients with mild to moderate sagging, CO₂ hybrid laser offers an effective alternative, improving excess skin, lines, and eyelid texture without incisions or stitches.

item2.a: The session is well-tolerated and performed with topical anesthesia. It feels like a mild warming sensation, followed by redness and small scabs for a few days.

item3.a: Usually, 1 to 2 sessions are sufficient, depending on the level of sagging and the individual’s skin response.

item4.q: How long do the results last?
item4.a: Results can last for years, especially when paired with proper skin care and overall health. Collagen continues to be produced for months after the procedure.

item5.a: Recovery is quick. There may be redness and small scabs that last 5–7 days, but most people return to their activities quickly with minor precautions.
